item.description:
We'll be walking Chatfield again, as this is short notice and everyone seems to enjoy it here. With all the rain, the trees are really leafing out, and the stream should be flowing nicely - just what we need to relax after work!

Chatfield Hollow is located on Route 80 in Killingworth, just west of the route 80 / 81 traffic circle. As always, we will meet by the ranger's booth in the entrance to the park.

One member is bringing her dogs, and others are welcome.

REMINDER: This is a GROUP event. Once we start walking, if you decide to turn back or take a different trail, please tell the organizer. We don't want to be wondering what happened, where you went, and if you're all right.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the ranger's booth at the entrance.
item.name: Wednesday Walk
